adminMint(address,uint256).notice: This is an admin mint function to mint a quantity to a specific address

adminMintAirdrop(address[]).notice: This is an admin mint function to mint a single nft each to a list of addresses

mintedPerAddress(address).notice: Function to return the specific sales details for a given address

owner().notice: This is the opensea/public owner setting that can be set by the contract admin

purchasePresale(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: External purchase presale function (takes a merkle proof and matches to root) (payable in eth)

saleDetails().notice: Function to return the global sales details for the given drop

params.to: list of addresses to mint an NFT each to

params.minter: address for minter to return mint information for

params.merkleProof: input for merkle proof leaf verified by merkle root
params.pricePerToken: price per token allowed (verified by merkle root)
